query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT ARA ,BSU ,SUM(VALUE(MOQ, 0)) MOQ ,SUM(VALUE(COQ, 0)) COQ ,SUM(VALUE(ROQ, 0)) ROQ ,SUM(VALUE(TOQ, 0)) TOQ ,SUM(VALUE(TOQ_STO , 0)) TOQ_STO ,SUM(VALUE(TOQ_FM , 0)) TOQ_FM ,SUM(VALUE(TOQ_TGB , 0)) TOQ_TGB ,SUM(VALUE(TOQ_HRTS, 0)) TOQ_HRTS ,SUM(VALUE(TOQ_SLA, 0)) TOQ_SLA FROM ( SELECT A.YYYYMM ,A.ARA, A.BSU ,(MBQ + MGQ + MIQ) MOQ ,(CPQ_3 + CPQ_3E) COQ ,(RPQ_1 + RPQ_3 + RPQ_4) ROQ ,(TCQ) TOQ ,(TCQ_STO) TOQ_STO ,(TCQ_FM ) TOQ_FM ,(TCQ_TGB ) TOQ_TGB ,(TCQ_HRTS) TOQ_HRTS ,(TCQ_SLA ) TOQ_SLA
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST950N A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.YYYYMM = #BYYMM#
) AS A
GROUP BY A.YYYYMM, A.ARA, A.BSU ) AS B ON A.ARA = B.ARA AND A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET MOQ = B.MOQ ,COQ = B.COQ ,ROQ = B.ROQ ,TOQ = B.TOQ ,TOQ_STO = B.TOQ_STO ,TOQ_FM = B.TOQ_FM ,TOQ_TGB = B.TOQ_TGB ,TOQ_HRTS = B.TOQ_HRTS ,TOQ_SLA = B.TOQ_SLA
